DOC.brief_title: Adverse Events Pharmaceutical Bioequivalence Study Two Formulations Metformine Hydrochloride 500 mg
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVE : To evaluate , healthy volunteer , bioavailability two product contain metformine 500 mg determine bioequivalent identify occurrence adverse event . MATERIAL AND METHODS : The study approve research Ethics Committee twenty-eight volunteer sign select IC . An open , randomize , crossover study two period confinement interval seven day perform . Twenty ( 20 ) blood collection perform 30 minute 36 hour drug administration . Plasma sample analyze liquid chromatography mass spectrometry ( LC-MS/MS ) . Statistical analysis conduct base pharmacokinetic parameter : maximum concentration ( Cmax ) area curve ( AUC 0-te AUC 0-inf ) . Analysis variance ( ANOVA ) model appropriate employ two period cross logarithmically transform data .
DOC.criteria: Within 10 % ideal body weight Age 18 50 year Healthy condition Ability understand write informed consent Pregnancy Smokers Alcohol drug
